Subjects: Virgin Mary, hymns to; hymns, to Virgin Mary
_description: Hymn to the Virgin, ‘more in dygnyte þan all seyntes’ — one 6-line tail-rhyme stanza

BodeMus23.First Lines:
Hayle flowre of vyrgynyteIn heuyn þou haste
                    pryncypalite…
BodeMus23.Last Lines:
…þan all seyntes that euyr schall beor Angelis yn heuyn
                    bowre
